photosynthesis: Nzira iyo zvirimwa zvinoshandisa chiedza chezuva, mvura, uye CO2 kugadzira chikafu (glucose)
kufema kwemasero: Maitiro ayo maseru anotsemura glucose kuburitsa simba
chlorophyll: Green pigment muzvirimwa zvinotora chiedza chezuva chephotosynthesis
dna: Deoxyribonucleic acid, molecule inotakura ruzivo rwemajini
rna: Ribonucleic acid, molecule inobatanidzwa muprotein synthesis
protein: Molecule inoumbwa neamino acids, ichiita mabasa akasiyana emuviri
sero: Basic unit yehupenyu, hwaro hwekuvaka hwezvinhu zvese zvipenyu
tishu: Boka remasero akafanana anoshanda pamwechete kuita basa chairo
nhengo: Boka rematishu rinoshanda pamwechete kuita basa chairo
organ system: Boka remitezo inoshanda pamwe chete kuita basa rakaoma
homeostasis: Kugona kwechipenyu kuchengetedza nzvimbo yakagadzikana yemukati
adaptation: Shanduko mune chipenyu chinoibatsira kurarama uye kubereka munzvimbo yayo
evolution: Nzira iyo huwandu hwezvipenyu hunochinja nekufamba kwenguva
kusarudzwa kwepanyama: Nzira iyo zvipenyu zvine maitiro anoenderana nenharaunda yazvo zvinokwanisa kurarama nekuberekana
ecology: Kudzidza nezvekuti zvipenyu zvinodyidzana sei pamwe chete nenharaunda yazvo
ecosystem: Nharaunda yezvipenyu uye nharaunda yavo isingararame ichidyidzana
taxonomy: Bazi reBiology rine chekuita nekuronga zvipenyu
morphology: Bazi reBiology rine chekuita nekudzidza kwechimiro uye chimiro
physiology: Bazi reBiology rine chekuita nekudzidza kwekuita uye maitiro mune zvipenyu
autotroph: Zvisikwa zvinogona kugadzira chikafu chayo uchishandisa chiedza kana makemikari (semuenzaniso, zvirimwa)
heterotroph: Mhuka inowana chikafu nekudya zvimwe zvipenyu (semuenzaniso, mhuka)
mutengi: Zvisikwa zvinodya organic zvinhu zvinogadzirwa nezvimwe zvipenyu (semuenzaniso, mhuka)
decomposer: Zvisikwa zvinopwanya zvipenyu zvakafa uye organic zvinhu (semuenzaniso, fungi, mabhakitiriya)
vanhu: Boka rezvipenyu zvemhando imwe chete inogara mune imwe nzvimbo
community: Boka revanhu vakasiyana vanodyidzana mune imwe nzvimbo
biome: Ecosystem yakakura ine hunhu hwezvirimwa nemhuka (semuenzaniso, renje, sango rinonaya mvura zhinji)
biodiversity: Hupenyu hwakasiyana-siyana paPasi pamatanho ese, kubva kumajini kuenda kune ecosystems
